title: Al Franken on Life in the Senate
description: Franken discusses his new political memoir; Thomas E. Ricks talks about “Churchill and Orwell”; and Dav Pilkey on the movie adaptation of “Captain Underpants” and more.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
